title: Building and deploying a Bluey episode recommendation system in R
venue: Siligong.Data
image: "featured.png"

Does your child explain Bluey episodes to you but you have no idea what episode they are talking about? This talk will show how to build and deploy a basic data science backed web application in R  

[blueysearch app](https://deanmarchiori.shinyapps.io/blueysearch/)
